comments:
This bug is reported by "pmaka@interia.pl" on 2006/8/29 on newsgroup "eclipse.dsdp.ercp".

Run eRCP RC1 on J2SE.
Launch Application Manager to access the Update site.
Select one update site, and click the "Next" button.
Get the following exceptions.

Problem occurs on J2SE (a bug in BookmarkScreen.java). I've checked in the fixs to CVS on 20060901. Should be available in next build (RC2).
